balance_BTC.description: Value in BTC at date/time displayed in field 'time'

balance_EUR.description: Value in EUR with conversion rate as of date/time displayed in field 'time'

balance_USD.description: Value in USD with conversion rate as of date/time displayed in field 'time'

description: An object to describe a Bitcoin wallet. Best to be used with bitcoin-transactions.
name: btc-wallet
